      • setGroups

        public void setGroups​(Collection<SearchGroup<MutableValue>> searchGroups)
        Description copied from class: GroupSelector
        Set a restriction on the group values returned by this selector

        If the selector is positioned on a document whose group value is not contained within this set, then GroupSelector.advanceTo(int) will return GroupSelector.State.SKIP

        Specified by:
        setGroups in class GroupSelector<MutableValue>
        Parameters:
        searchGroups - a set of SearchGroup objects to limit selections to
